title: Base Telemetry Event
description: Base schema for all Syncphony telemetry events, defining common metadata.

event_id.description: Unique identifier for this specific event instance (e.g., UUID).

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 UTC timestamp of when the event occurred.

schema_version.description: Semantic version of the schema used for this event (e.g., '1.0.0').

musician_name.description: Name of the Musician or component emitting the event (e.g., 'Conductor', 'ShellExecutorMusician').

task_id.description: Optional: ID of the Symphony task related to this event.

parent_event_id.description: Optional: For sub-events (e.g., sub_log_entry), ID of the parent event.

sensitive_data_masked.description: Indicates if any sensitive data within the payload was masked.
